aboutUs.title: Solution - Transparency - Cooperation
aboutUs.content: Our Technology Solutions and Consulting team will work with our clients to design, implement and optimize their Technology investment and transformation strategies. We will capture essential goals, long-term growth vision, and future needs to help select and implement solutions that match technology investments and business strategy and growth for businesses.

lists.name: Commitment
lists.desc: Be accountable, work together as a team and communicate clearly.

lists.name: Innovation
lists.desc: Think outside the box, challenge constructively and act before others do.

lists.name: Experience
lists.desc: Working with an agile and highly experienced team.

lists.name: Quality
lists.desc: Always deliver exceptional quality, accomplish and improve.

content.name: Provide solutions
content.description: Provide big data platform solutions: Data crawler,Data Lake, Data Streaming, Data Processing, Data Warehouse, Data Mining

content.name: Business Jutification
content.description: Prior to doing anything on a software project,  we've always put a premium on identifying client needs based on their business model, current problems, and goals. These information helps us to map out the existing workflows and client future goals.

content.name: Strategy and Solution Design
content.description: We start documenting , developing, prototyping, and user testing your platform or product after gathering your requirements in a whiteboard session.

content.name: Development
content.description: This phase involved programming and coding based on your approved designs. Our development lifecycle is divided into 5 stages: Design, Coding, Testing, Release and Maintance

content.name: Testing
content.description: At this stage, we focus on the sequence of that during software testing. By employing a sane software testing life cycle,an organization ends up with a quality strategy more likely to better results. Presenting a perfect product to the customer is the end goal of every organization.

content.name: Deployment and Maintainance
content.description: We getting software into the hands of the clients. On your approval, our team will release system in live. We exclusively take care of the process of changing a system after it has been delivered.

content.name: Support and Customer Survice
content.description: Onboarding refers to the entire process of helping new customers understand how to use our products and services. We maintain and optimize products and platforms on a regular basis, market strategies, and give real-time assistance.

techProduct.infoProduct: Provide a platform that allows users to install and manage batteries for charging system of Vinfast's battery factory.
The system allows businesses/organizations to create electronic invoices and pay taxes online.

techProduct.nameProduct: Hệ thống giám sát và lắng nghe thông tin mạng xã hội
techProduct.infoProduct: Xây dựng và phát triển nền tảng dữ liệu lớn phục vụ việc giám sát và lắng nghe thông tin từ xác trang MXH: facebook, twitter, các trang báo điện tử. Tích hợp các giải pháp: Crawler, Big Data, AI.
Blockchain project aims to connect people who enjoy outdoor sports like jogging, cycling, and swimming to earn money.

techProduct.nameProduct: Quản lý chấm công - Time Keeping Systems
techProduct.infoProduct: Offer comprehensive control of employee working time through its state of the art time management software. The software also offers the ability to generate numerous useful analytical reports to address issues.

list.content: 1. Keep Up To Date With HR Matters
3. Analytic Reports & Data for Cost Saving

techProduct.nameProduct: Tối ưu giờ làm việc - Time Management System
techProduct.infoProduct: Using math tools, automate and optimize shift creation. Manage and connect with other Time Keeping System.

techProduct.nameProduct: Ứng dụng đặt xe đưa/đón cho học viên trường đào tạo lái xe (Car Booking Application)
techProduct.infoProduct: Managing drivers and routes Allows customers (students of the driver training school) to schedule pick up and drop off Automatically allocate schedules and routes for drivers to pick up and drop off students

techProduct.nameProduct: Hệ thống mạng xã hội liên kết giữa sinh viên và các công ty
techProduct.infoProduct: Provide services for customers (companies businesses) to create events/workshops to connect the company with incoming students. Real-time chat feature between graduating students and former students of the same university, who are working at companies that are interested in graduating students

techProduct.nameProduct: Hệ thống quản lý rủi ro các toà nhà  (Building Management System)
techProduct.infoProduct: Using math tools, automate and optimize shift creation. Manage and connect with other Time Keeping System.

techProduct.nameProduct: Tối ưu giờ làm việc - Time Management System
techProduct.infoProduct: Management of buildings, including management of rooms, floors, properties, etc. Allows owners to organize tender projects for survey risk assessment Allow contractors to participate in bidding, store risk survey information through mobile applications, then send data to the system. Export reports from the system. Export data and measurement charts to owners and organizations about the risks of buildings
Development of financial service modules for TPBank digital banking service portal.
Developing applications that allow synchronization of online customer support channels: livebank, stringee, cisco,... of TPBank digital bank.
Developing SMART educational platform for children. Provide solutions to open classes, schedule classes, register for classes, and payment online.

carousel.name: Hệ thống mạng xã hội liên kết giữa sinh viên và các công ty
carousel.desc: Mạng xã hội cho phép các công ty tạo các event để kết nối giữa công ty với các sinh viên sắp ra trường. Tính năng chat realtime giữa sinh viên sắp ra trường và những cựu sinh viên cùng trường đang làm việc trong công ty mà họ quan tâm...

carousel.name: Building Management System
carousel.desc: Management of buildings, including management of rooms, floors, properties, etc. Allows owners to organize tender projects for survey risk assessment. Allow contractors to participate in bidding, store risk survey information through mobile applications, then send data to the system. Export reports from the system. Export data and measurement charts to owners and organizations about the risks of buildings.

carousel.name: E-invoice
carousel.desc: The system allows businesses/organizations to create electronic invoices and pay taxes online.

carousel.name: Hệ thống giám sát và lắng nghe thông tin mạng xã hội
carousel.desc: Social media monitoring system. Allows Users to monitor and track information from platforms as facebook, twitter, electronic newspapers. Integrated solutions: Crawler, Big Data, AI.
